content.question: English nobles resisted peasant demands such as those described in the passage because agricultural labor in many parts of fourteenth-century Afro-Eurasia had become scarce as a result of which of the following developments?

choices.label: The migration of peasants to cities in search of industrial employment
Significant increase in mortality due to the spread of epidemic diseases
The development of wage-based economies with the emergence of capitalism
Widespread famine resulting from rising global temperatures

content.answer: Significant increase in mortality due to the spread of epidemic diseases

topic.text: 1.6: Developments in Europe from c. 1200 to c. 1450
